Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The shurians and their allies threaten our foothold in Fyrmount.

Destroy the {@LinkCreature:4#3031#tyraks}, {@LinkCreature:4#3041#shurian mindbenders}, and their {@LinkCreature:4#3042#hellion thralls}.

Report to Tifane at Firebase Valor when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
